name: Poison
description: You coat your weapon in a deadly poison.  For a number of attacks equal to 3 plus your Assassin level, the attack poisons the target.  Unless the target makes a physical resistance check, they will take 1 to 6 damage per round for 2 rounds.  The poison wears off it has not been used after 5 rounds.  You must be wielding a weapon (either melee or ranged) to activate this ability.

upgrades.description: With Lingering Poison, your poison ability now lasts for up to 8 rounds on your weapon.  The effects of the poison on your target last for 3 rounds instead of 2.
With Lethal Poison, your poison does an additional 1 point of damage per 2 Assassin levels per round.
